mapper.select: SELECT ITEM.ITEM_CODE , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_PRICE , ITEM_INTRO , ATTACHED_IMG_NAME , CATE_CODE , ROWNUM FROM ITEM ITEM, ITEM_IMG IMG WHERE ITEM.ITEM_CODE = IMG.ITEM_CODE AND IS_MAIN = 'Y' AND ITEM_STATUS = 2 AND ROWNUM < 21 ORDER BY ITEM_CODE DESC
SELECT CATE_CODE , CATE_NAME , CATE_PASS FROM CATEGORY ORDER BY CATE_CODE

SELECT ITEM.ITEM_CODE , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_PRICE , ITEM_INTRO , ITEM_STOCK , ITEM_STATUS , CATE_CODE , ATTACHED_IMG_NAME FROM ITEM ITEM, ITEM_IMG IMG WHERE ITEM.ITEM_CODE = IMG.ITEM_CODE AND ITEM.ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode}
SELECT CATE_NAME , CATE_CODE FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATE_CODE = #{cateCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE ITEM SET ITEM_STATUS = 3 WHERE ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode}
